Submitting Pset solutions

Mar 30, 2018 • Gaurav Singh • Notes, Important • Pset

  • Create a new public GitHub repo dv.pset under your profile. You will be submitting Pset solutions in this repo.

  • Open Pset from the navigation above and open the problem given to you.

  • Commit your solution to this repo under the folder named by and ask for a review either directly (if in the class) or [here](https://github.com/mathscapes/DecodeVector/issues) if asking remotely.

  • Mark your progress here. Your rating will be calculated from here.

Learn more

  • Using Github
  • Rating System

In case of any queries, create a issue here.
